div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 10:15 am CDT

td.span: Showers and possibly a thunderstorm before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rainfall. High near 69. Southeast wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

Showers and thunderstorms likely, mainly before 1am. Cloudy, with a low around 55. South wind 5 to 15 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
Cloudy through mid morning, then gradual clearing, with a high near 73. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph.

div.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.

input.p: Your name, phone number and email address are kept private and are for the sole use of the Briggs Public School site. For full details, see our privacy and security policy.
